notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.body: Email notifications for delivery confirmations, reminders, and updates.

timezone.title: Timezone & Localization
timezone.body: All deliveries are scheduled in your local timezone. DST awareness ensures accurate delivery times.

billing.title: Billing & Subscription
billing.description: Manage your subscription, usage, and payments
billing.body: View your subscription status, track usage, manage payment methods, and access invoices.

privacy.title: Privacy & Data
privacy.description: Control your data and privacy settings
privacy.body: All letters are encrypted at rest (AES-256-GCM). Export your data or delete your account at any time.

danger.title: Danger Zone
danger.body: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
